actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include service as an enrollee-trainee in the U.S. Maritime Service as military service for purposes of the civil service retirement system.

summary.text: Includes service as an enrollee-trainee in the United States Maritime Service as military service for purposes of the civil service retirement system. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 8331(13)(D)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include service as an enrollee-trainee in the U.S. Maritime Service as military service for purposes of the civil service retirement system.
